description: Azure Monkshood (Aconitum carmichaelii var. angustius) is an attractive and captivating flowering species that easily adds an eye-catching pop of color to any garden. This perennial has large, bright electric blue hooded flowers that rise tall on strong, sturdy stems. Azure Monkshood is an easy-to-care for plant that thrives in shady gardens, and produces delicate flowers from mid- to late-summer. Its unique color and exotic beauty add a special charm that is sure to be admired. Not only is it beautiful, it is also surprisingly easy to cultivate.
